title: Toxic Players and @#%&ty attitudes
body:
Not sure if you are feeling the same way, but I'm getting tired of toxic players in every single game. 

Even when a game goes well, people still end up flaming each other.

Flaming starts with us, and should end with us. If people work together to dismiss and not encourage this behavior, maybe we can work together to put an end to this Bull@#$% culture. 

Things go wrong in a game - fix it, don't make it worse.

replies.body: Mute button bro. Like I said on another post I mute the instant someone says something negative. I don't experience a toxic community because I mute the problem people.
That does also work, but it's not solving the root of the problem, only the symptom.

Massive community of an online team based objective pvp game with wide spectrum of age group plus being highly accessible as a f2p title.

You have just acquired the recipe for "GEEGEE LOL NOOB AUTIST UR BAD KILL URSELF".

It's about time for the community to evolve.

+1

I don't care for people raging at me, as I am used to it due to playing MOBA games for a long time, but I don't think it's great for other players.

Every time I would like to teach new people the game, like friends or maybe even my Fiancee, I have to first start thinking of how to warn them about flamers and/or just keep muting everyone in every single game. 

League is the biggest and best MOBA out there, we have the most players. With that in mind, where do we draw the line, where do we start as a community to reject this behavior?

Change starts with us. Sounds cheesy I know - I just think it's time to improve this. OCE, where most people are actually really nice and awesome in RL - why so toxic ingame? 

#dunno

Instead of making a new thread that is repeated 10+ time a day, you could go qq on the end of another toxicity thread.
Seriously though, OCE has nothing on some of the other servers.
